content: Hi all. Not sure where exactly this chore falls under (wg-triage or @WG-prioritization), but we should be adding team labels (T-compiler, T-libs-api, etc.) to PRs. Particularly, the compiler team agenda is using the T-compiler label to identify PRs based on last review activity. There are currently 170 PRs without a team label. I don't think it's critical that new PRs get a label, but I think PRs older than 2-3 weeks definitely need to get labels so we can track them. (I also think that we should be labeling all PRs, not just S-waiting-on-review)
I recall some discussion about having one of the bots labeling new PR based on files modified. If/when that gets implemented it could also be run on existing PRs.
It's not a bad idea, but it needs someone to do the implementation work
I think maybe we should open an issue on the triagebot repo?
